attributes.action: Reward Key workers that support the country through the pandemic with tax break
attributes.additional_details:
Without the key workers the country would have not coped. These key workers should be rewarded as they made many sacrifices. Furloughed workers were paid to sit at home and and key workers were not. 
The government should afford the same fairness and level of payments payed to the critical / key workers by way of a tax relief.
attributes.background: All Key / critical Workers should get a tax reduction to reflect the furloughed workers and their payments to show fairness and to reward the key workers who kept the country going. Max Furloughed payments should be applied to the key workers but as a tax relief.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

Give all key workers a £10,000 tax break (in addition to the existing allowance): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320647

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903
